pr_title: #6364 fixed sql, report template and removed warnings for null values

timeline.message: #6364 Saving reports under name defined in reportfilename column.
#6364 Added a fixed price precision of 2 for the price column.
#6364 Fixed code from conflicts that broke things.

timeline.bodyText: i kindof liked it this way (this version is also the fixed one). maybe it makes sense to extract it to a method like extractResultFileName(result), but i particularly like the logging, for support purposes
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: makes sense to have logging, will revert to the old way! (Also this got changed when merging the old branch)
replies.author: dragospodariu96

timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: this somehow got here when merging the old branch into this one!
replies.author: dragospodariu96

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/de.metas.report/report-service/src/main/java/de/metas/report/rest/ReportRestController.java b/de.metas.report/report-service/src/main/java/de/metas/report/rest/ReportRestController.java
index d436b082df..f97041ae4f 100644
--- a/de.metas.report/report-service/src/main/java/de/metas/report/rest/ReportRestController.java
+++ b/de.metas.report/report-service/src/main/java/de/metas/report/rest/ReportRestController.java

@@ -97,7 +119,7 @@ public class ReportRestController
 	{
 		final Throwable cause = AdempiereException.extractCause(throwable);
 
-		final String adLanguageEffective = !Check.isBlank(adLanguage)
+		final String adLanguageEffective = Check.isNotBlank(adLanguage)
 				? adLanguage
 				: Language.getBaseAD_Language();

timeline.bodyText: yeah, that's the last fix that i made in x-mas and didn't yet put to master
timeline.author: metas-ts

replies.bodyText: yeah, thought it's good to put it with this ocassion!
replies.author: dragospodariu96
